org.hps.online.recon.eventbus

Class OnlineEventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus
      • org.hps.online.recon.eventbus.OnlineEventBus

  • public class OnlineEventBus
extends com.google.common.eventbus.EventBus
    An event bus to read ET events, convert to EVIO, and generate reconstructed LCIO events using an event builder and job manager. Special objects are used for error handling, signaling end of run, and stopping the ET event loop.
